text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the requirement for transfer pricing purposes under Option B (UK employment + cost recharge). It states: 'The Italian parent deducts the management fee/recharge for IRES/IRAP purposes, provided: - The recharge is at arm's length (transfer-pricing rules, Art. 110 co. 7 TUIR & OECD TP Guidelines). - There is a proper intercompany service agreement documenting the nature and benefit of the service.' This directly confirms the necessity of a written intercompany agreement for transfer pricing documentation.", "criterion_id": "deff104c-c11b-446b-a5b7-3d0704521420"}
